benchmark_details.name: TruthQuest
benchmark_details.overview: TruthQuest is a benchmark designed to evaluate the suppositional reasoning capabilities of large language models through knights and knaves puzzles while presenting problems of varying complexity.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide an evaluation benchmark for the reasoning capabilities of large language models in the context of knights and knaves puzzles.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark currently includes only knights and knaves puzzles with a single, unique solution.

data.source: Generated instances of knights and knaves puzzles

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the exactness of the model's predictions against the correct solutions.
methodology.interpretation: A high accuracy rate indicates proficient reasoning capabilities.
methodology.validation: Evaluation and validation through manual inspection of a subset of model responses.
